Welcome to the Phidget Erlang Manager Documention - version $version

Dependencies

Mandatory
  • Phidget21 library (available at http://www.phidgets.com/)
  • litm library (available at http://litm.googlecode.com/)
  • pthread library

To build from source:

  • scons
  • python >= 2.5
